The Department of Surgical Gastroenterology gets the award

The Department of Surgical Gastroenterology at Jawaharlal Institute of Post graduate Medical Education and Research has been awarded the certification of ISO 9001:2015, following two assessments carried out by the ISO certification body, Breakthrough Management Quality Registrar (BMQR) in November and December 2015.

The certification ISO 9001:2015 is awarded for institutions which maintain excellent quality for their products and services. The certification is accredited by the American International Accreditation Organization’s Bureau of Accredited Registrars (AIAO-BAR). Facilities in the department, standard of patient care, qualifications of faculty and other staff, availability of state-of-the-art equipment and the standard of research were some of the criteria used for assessment.

At the Department of Surgical Gastroenterology, treatment is provided for complicated problems affecting the abdomen, and liver surgeries, pancreas surgeries, esophagus surgeries, advanced laparoscopic surgeries are also carried out.
